        Parameters:
        flightSegment -
        pricingDetailPerAdult -
        pricingDetailPerInfant -
        pricingDetailPerChild -
        pricingDetailPerSenior -
        departure -
        arrival -
        carrierCode - providing the airline / carrier code
        number - the flight number as assigned by the carrier
        aircraft -
        operating -
        duration - stop duration in ISO8601 PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M
        stops - information regarding the different stops composing the flight segment. E.g. technical stop, change of gauge...
        id - Id of the segment
        numberOfStops - Number of stops
        blacklistedInEU - When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission. To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline
        co2Emissions - CO2 Information

      • getBlacklistedInEU

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Boolean getBlacklistedInEU()

        When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission.

        To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline

        See Also:
        list of the banned airlines

      • setBlacklistedInEU

        public void setBlacklistedInEU(@Nullable
                               java.lang.Boolean p)

        When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission.

        To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline

        Parameters:
        p - When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission. To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline
        See Also:
        list of the banned airlines

        When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission.

        To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline
